name: City Coach Bus Simulator 2019
description:
The City Bus Diving Simulator 3D game allows you to play two thrilling passenger bus parking modes. Play your favorite bus transport simulator 2018 game mode to simulate on the road tracks and enjoy the best and smooth gameplay ever. There are multiple uphill buses available in this city coach driving game 2018. Select your desired hill-bus SIM for completing each simulating mission and be the perfect drift rider of the bus-3D game. Use the perfect combination of speed and balance and avoid road accidents and crashes. The passenger pick and drop transportation service is a real challenge, so brace yourself for some thrilling and furious buss riding adventure in the mid of the modern city while avoiding the skyscrapers and the other motor riders. Keep an eye on the timer and reach the destination on time.

Game Features of City Bus Diving Simulator 3D:

• Smooth tilting and easy perfect game controls.
• Beautiful sound and music.
• User-friendly GUI and detailed textures.
• Multiple camera views.
• A wide variety of uphill buses.
• Extreme traffic rush to drive.

Game Play:

• Tilt your device to steer the uphill bus simulator.
• Use accelerate button to speed up your ride.
• Use the brake button to stop or reverse the tourist coach.


If you like City Bus Diving Simulator 3D, please try our other games by clicking “More from Developer” or by visiting our publisher account. Drop your valuable feedback so we would be appreciable enough to make more likewise games for you.
